name: Arjun Bhardwaj
body: Hi ! This is the personal webpage. That's me trying to snap a picture to upload to this website. ## About I am currently in the final year of my Bachelor of Technology (B-Tech) degree at Indian Institute of Technology, Mandi. ## Contact Please feel free to contact me for details of my projects or for discussing collaborations. You can reach me at bhardwaj.arjun.14@gmail.com and arjun_bhardwaj@students.iitmandi.ac.in
